data.eml:eml: Phlugis ocraceovittata and its ultrasonic calling song (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae, Phlugidini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chamorro-Rengifo, Juliana, Braun, Holger (2016): Phlugis ocraceovittata and its ultrasonic calling song (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae, Phlugidini). Zootaxa 4107 (3): 439-443, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4107.3.12
